metadata.Title: CVE-2021-32490 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A flaw was found in djvulibre-3.5.28 and earlier. An out of bounds write in function DJVU::filter_bv() via crafted djvu file may lead to application crash and other consequences.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-32490` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

djview - 3.5.27.1-14ubuntu0.1
djview3 - 3.5.27.1-14ubuntu0.1
djvulibre-bin - 3.5.27.1-14ubuntu0.1
djvulibre-desktop - 3.5.27.1-14ubuntu0.1
djvuserve - 3.5.27.1-14ubuntu0.1
libdjvulibre-text - 3.5.27.1-14ubuntu0.1
libdjvulibre21 - 3.5.27.1-14ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: djvulibre package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.5.27.1-14ubuntu0.1').
